definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: Children mostly became orphans from being born out of wedlock or women dying in childbirth.
sentences.chinese: 通常非婚生或是母亲难产而死的孩子都沦为了孤儿。

sentences.english: There certainly is greater acceptance of children being born out of wedlock.
sentences.chinese: 对非婚生子女的接受程度显然大大提高了。

sentences.english: There is a strong correlation between the rate of birth and the number of babies born out of wedlock.
sentences.chinese: 出生率和非婚生孩子之间存在很强的相关性。

sentences.english: Illegitimate child claim system is an important system of the family law.
sentences.chinese: 非婚生子女认领制度是亲属法上的一项重要制度。

sentences.english: Only 2% of births take place out of wedlock.
sentences.chinese: 在日本，只有2%的情侣会非婚生子。

sentences.english: Not that keeping a baby out-of-wedlock in China would be easy.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，想养育一个非婚生子女也没那么容易。

sentences.english: Soon she becomes pregnant and births an illegitimate girl .
sentences.chinese: 没多久珍妮怀了孕，产下一非婚生的小女儿。

sentences.english: You're having a baby out of wedlock, your life is over.
sentences.chinese: 你有一个非婚生子的话，你的生活就算是完了。

sentences.english: Socially, out-of-wedlock births are heavily discouraged.
sentences.chinese: 在社会上，非婚生子的情况受到严重歧视。

sentences.english: Coupled with dramatic breakdown in the black family structure has been an astonishing growth in the rate of illegitimacy.
sentences.chinese: 伴随着黑人家庭结构解体的是非婚生率的惊人增长。

definition: to apply for residence/to register a birth
